events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred last night, initiating the claim process for vehicle damage.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords in the report indicating a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the customer's auto accident claim and provide support.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and informed the customer about the next steps.
Requested several documents from the customer, including police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all requested documents on time, providing detailed images and official accident report.
Investigation began into the circumstances of the accident, including interviews and damage assessment.
Investigation completed confirming liability and validating extent of vehicle damages claimed.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and rental car expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for approved claim amount was issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account.
Claim was closed successfully with all parties informed of the final resolution and payment issuance.
The claim file was archived in the system for future reference and record-keeping purposes.
